documents.document: I'm talented at napping but not so gifted at sleeping at the appropriate time
falcons u straight killin it
@MitchGraham27 throwback to your beautiful face this time last year 😂 https://t.co/QCzT5fjPZ5
She's on the fucking roof. Good for you Gaga. You do you.
Then they watch it all together and make it into an insane drinking game every time theres an ad/ product placement/ mention Pepsi
Can't tell if the organisers of the SB just take the piss with the amount of advertising they fit in
I'm not here for the half time show but if it will put my essay off even longer I'm down.
wow Brady is not doing well. LOL
@sofapunditjack I know whats up
Supporting the Falcons because fuck Tom Brady that's why #SB51
My essay due on thursday is only 2 pages but I've been trying to write it for over a week now. I get so distractedddddd
Where can I watch the Superbowl online in Canada ? anyone?
New flat mate debacles continue... She went to hang a wet towel on the balcony to dry it off... It is snowing.
I'm working very hard at achieving this goal this year
My plan is to watch all of the Netflix and Tv in the world by the time I go into my final year of Uni so I can focus for my dissertation
@MarthaRiddell_ not in Edin- I'll explain
What do you do if you accidentally get a dick pic over facebook messenger from someone you worked with over the summer #askingforafriend
How else do you see family if its not when passing thru ur city when touring the country with @arkellsmusic #thankyouarkellsforbringingNigel
It's tough being away from family here but I am lucky @sadsongco happens to be on a North American tour with his band coming to UBC <3
@alyssanilsen I'll try talk him into it on Wednesday!
US Road Trip planning with the big bro @DavidBromfield2 has made today 1038758 times better
Other people planning their mad 21st birthday celebrations and I'm planning which National Park imma be in #naturenerd
blows my mind that we just finished week 4 of the semester and I only have 9 teaching weeks left at UBC #dontmakemeleave
Living in Vancouver will ruin TV & Films for you b/c you will recognise half the locations featured in everything as being in Vancouver
don't panic the @NatlParkService website didn't take down all references to climate change unlike some websites https://t.co/WctjkeK7TC ...
Silencing the people telling the truth doesn't make it any less true
He's actually building a fucking wall 🤔
I may not be achieving much but I am a gold member with @StarbucksUK and @StarbucksCanada simultaneously so there is that 🌟
"I'm pretty but tough like a diamond or beef jerky in a ball gown"
so excited for tomorrows adventuring and feasting
#Inauguration pathetic fallacy when it rains straight away
Well that's that. Good Luck America ❤️
Will there be a separate parade in with all of Trumps exwives and wife #InaugurationDay
They made a space for me in the bed, put a pillow in it & cuddled it as if it were me. I MISS THEM SO MUCH IT HURTS… https://t.co/jOiJlHF1lR
@sadsongco @arkellsmusic @frankturner IM SO EXCITED TO SEE YOU AND THEM!! ✨
All my bestest friends are out in Edinburgh together tonight and I miss themmmmm 😩
@instagram pls hurry
@instagram keeps crashing and it's the most stressful part of my life atm
Blessed to be able to hold my alcohol #whenmybestfriendscant
Win 2 tickets to the adults-only #AfterHoursVA at @VanAqua on Jan 19 via @VancityBuzz https://t.co/pTy9yY4V0e RT to enter!
This never fails to cheer me up https://t.co/31PcZrKCis #gosdenuknow
FIGHT FIGHT FIGHT FIGHT #HockeyIn4Words
Should be ballin post student loan coming in but I already spent the entirety of it on paying for my accommodation 🙃🙃🙃
Appreciation tweet for all the genuinely lovely friends I've already made out here who are so sweet and caring and thoughtful. THE REAL MVPS
@edsheeran mate you just completely nailed it with Castle on the Hill.
and driving 90 down those country lanes......... which I've obviously never done.
Ed Sheeran - Castle On The Hill [Official Lyric Video] https://t.co/43f7TXBWWw << Holy shit this makes me miss my wee English village home
@jamieadkins13 IS THIS TRUE!?
WHAT IS HAPPENING WHY IS HE HAPPENING OMG NO https://t.co/1fqhIedGKR
I enjoy the gym because getting fit and all that but also I fancy 80% of the people there
@mgnsnddn_ naw fuck off never coming back now 😒
The more you care, the more the world finds ways to hurt you for it
@_chloefarmer this is the stuff of nightmares
I have the best friends ever back in Edinburgh and I'm not gonna lie- I'm missing my people 😩
ok got the memo- won't be bothering (with) you anymore
@_chloefarmer if you're serious I'm pretty angry at you that you didn't get a selfie
Update: previously mentioned bitch on the bus has YASS tattooed on her knuckle 😂
Bitch on the bus has opened the window. It's 4 degrees nah
JUST HAD TO TEACH MY NEW HONG KONGESE FLATMATE THAT YOU CAN'T PUT METAL IN THE MICROWAVE. #crisisaverted #lordgivemestrength #SOS
Today at the gym a girl went over to her friend after lifting a weight like 3 times and said 'I'm done with exercise for 2017'. I can relate
Realised I have turned into a walking cliché by getting new hair and a gym membership in the new year. #sorry #newyearnewme
Been in Seattle airport for 5 mins- seen 3 Starbucks.
Ugh- gotta go home...... very early https://t.co/D2G0Oq7Xl2
Not even a little bit blond anymore for the first time since I was 13 💇🏼💇🏼
Being 8 time zones behind the UK is weird. It's not even 2017 yet
Accidentally did a new year new me thing with a hair cut today. However, I'm gonna be the same sassy pain in the ass this year 🔥🔥🔥
But at the same time (as my friends have pointed out to me) I am very blessed with the life I have and the place I do live.
Trying to hold it together but leaving somewhere you love is never easy
@MarthaRiddell_ will update you via snapchat when you are awake
Open bottle of wine needs finishing before we check out- I'm not one to shy away from a challenge… https://t.co/ejwuseNguq
Honestly fuck packing to leave the mountains. I never want to leave
Finally telling a fuck boy what you've wanted to say for months 😤🤗🙃👍🏼 HAHA FUCK YOU
The post Christmas refrigerator grazing is one of the best things about the holidays
Come to the realisation that I really don't want to leave Colorado. I haven't really thought about going back home, I'm happy here 🙁
@Bmackey34 found home alone while searching for the game so I might stick with this because I know there's a good e… https://t.co/cu9ZL32urL
@Bmackey34 pls help what channel is it on- stuck in mountains & do not understand our tv
Is it Christmas? https://t.co/brGRkZQIXQ
The smell of bacon has filled the house and I am happy about that
Missing my Edinburgh baes this Christmas 😩🎄
Silly me for naively forgetting about Colorado's curse of giving me electric shocks when I touch anything or everything.
Pretty excited to have received a @mermhart book I didn't even know existed for Christmas- having read only the fir… https://t.co/1QtwEHSSxv
The trees name is Bruce the spruce
Christmas away from home means having to improvise with some stuff- this is our tree 🎄 https://t.co/xo4S6oDr4A
I've never understood going out on Christmas Eve- Christmas is for family not sleazy clubs & hangovers ✨
Colorado mountain snow day goals #bestie https://t.co/BqEkQckPLJ
Super excited for a super stressful morning re-learning how to ski with my family who all ski like pros. #happythursday 🎿
Last 24 hours have been 🔥🔥🔥
Back with Claire and my fam have just flown into Denver! 🎉💕#hollyjollychristmas
Today has been an incredible day
The generosity of people here actually overwhelms me
Also I get to see one of my bestest friends tomorrow for the first time in a year and a half so yeah I'm pretty pumped about that
Colorado ily & your people. incase that is unclear.
then I spent the afternoon drinking cocktails and eating Mexican food on a fricken insane ranch with old and new friends.
like for real. i spent the morning eating breakfast and drinking coffee with some people I love
Being back in Colorado is like some perfect day dream I swear
Super excited for the minus 13 temperatures on Saturday. Colorado you have my cold icy heart ❄️💙
ALL EXAMS AN GROUP PROJECTS FINALLY DONE. ITS CHRISSTTTMAAASS
@Delta does your carry on One Bag. One Item. No Charge policy mean I can take my small duffle bag and a hangbag for no charge?
Got Amazon vouchers for Christmas but I know I'll need to spend them on text books next semester #studentlife
